```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(readr)
copier <- read_csv("C:/mat374/copier.txt")
```
1. 
```{r}
copier_lm <- lm(Minutes ~ NCopiers, data = copier)
summary(copier_lm)
```
The estimated regression equation is: Minutes = -0.58 + NCopiers * 15.04

2.
```{r}
round(confint(copier_lm, level = 0.90),2)
```
With 90% confidence, the average service time is estimated to increase between 14.22 and 15.85 minutes for each additional ncopiers.

3.
```{r}
t_stat <- (coef(copier_lm)[2] - 16) / summary(copier_lm)$coefficients[2, 2]
p_value <- pt(t_stat, df = copier_lm$df.residual, lower.tail = TRUE)
p_value
```
Because p_value is 0.026 smaller than 0.05. Reject H0: average service time increases by less than 16 minutes per copier.
